title: Clandestine Finance System Helped Iran Withstand Sanctions Crush, Documents Show - The Wall Street Journal
content: Clandestine Finance System Helped Iran Withstand Sanctions Crush, Documents Show  The Wall Street Journal
description: The system has helped Tehran resist the Biden administrationâ€™s pressure to rejoin the 2015 nuclear deal, buying it time to advance its nuclear program even while negotiations were under way.
